Description: RepeatMasker is a program that screens DNA sequences for interspersed repeats and low complexity DNA sequences.
EDAM_topic: Sequence analysis, Sequence composition, complexity and repeats
bio.tool_description: A program that screens DNA sequences for interspersed repeats and low complexity DNA sequences. The output of the program is a detailed annotation of the repeats that are present in the query sequence as well as a modified version of the query sequence in which all the annotated repeats have been masked (default: replaced by Ns).
